description: A sip of the old-fashioned is always refreshing, but this recipe takes it up a notch. You'll need a pumpkin purée for an extra layer of flavor in your favorite cocktails! Add&nbsp;bourbon and Grand Marnier with some maple syrup before mixing them all together to make one delicious drink that will have people asking for more.
name: Pumpkin Old Fashioned
recipeIngredient: Orange peel, or rosemary sprig, for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: In a shaker, combine pumpkin purée with bitters. Add bourbon and brandy-based orange liqueur. Stir in apple syrup until combined.
recipeInstructions.text: In a shaker, combine pumpkin purée with bitters. Add bourbon and brandy-based orange liqueur. Stir in apple syrup until combined.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour mixture into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and garnish with a slice of orange peel or rosemary sprig.
